citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent semiannual facility inspection conducted by the IACUC was in August 2023, a period greater than 6
months at time of inspection. Failure to conduct semiannual inspections of the animal facilities at least once every six
months may hinder the ability of institutional officials to identify problems and take needed corrective actions to prevent
animal facilities and animal study areas from falling into disrepair and non-compliance. The IACUC, as an agent of the
research facility, shall inspect, at least once every six months, all of the facility's research animal facilities, including
animal study areas.
Correct by 14 June 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent semiannual facility inspection conducted by the IACUC was in August 2023, a period greater than 6 
months at time of inspection. Failure to conduct semiannual inspections of the animal facilities at least once every six 
months may hinder the ability of institutional officials to identify problems and take needed corrective actions to prevent 
animal facilities and animal study areas from falling into disrepair and non-compliance. The IACUC, as an agent of the 
research facility, shall inspect, at least once every six months, all of the facility's research animal facilities, including 
animal study areas. 
 
Correct by 14 June 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
